website_summaries.verdict: Worth trying if you're interested in a firm memory foam mattress, but not if you overheat easily.
pros: Little to no odor upon delivery
cons: Sleeps hotter than some of the other mattresses listed here

customer_reviews.title: Every order is different
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving two starts because I ordered two mattress, same model, same everything. The first order (3 months ago) was pretty good and probably in the middle of “Balanced” and “Med. Firm”, because of that we ordered a second one (2 weeks ago) and the mattress was “Plush” (soft). The second order as many reported did not inflate complete in the sides/corners, also is too soft for me and my wife, and because of that when both are sleeping we end up in the middle all the time. The problem for me is that the company does not have a standard product, each time you order you can get anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress is uneven, it has expanded to 9in in the middle, but only 6in at the corners and 7in at the edges. This is day 4, I would of hoped it would reached the 10in by now. We have to sleep in the middle of the bed, otherwise you feel the bed sloping. After reading all the wonderful reviews my husband and I are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AngieD

customer_reviews.title: On a Budget and want a foam This is the one
customer_reviews.text: Good buy! If you own a Tempur-pedic it is not the same quality. It's not hard like most of the reviews and it has weak sides . But for the money it is a great deal for a spare bed room motorhome RV or for someone with a small budget.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Compressed to 8 inch??
customer_reviews.text: The mattress expanded to 10 " on three sides but on one side it is only 8 inches. I think it is time to send back.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Taylor Lechem

customer_reviews.title: I love it! First of all it's relatively light compared ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave more then a sentence or two in my reviews but on this product I'm going all out! I love it! First of all it's relatively light compared to a pillowtop thick regular mattress. It's so much easier to move it. It's so easy to make. I never noticed a smell. It inflated quicker than expected. I've slept on other memory foam mattresses but never one a great as this one. It is perfect. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is comfortable and did inflate to full size, however the smell is very strong. I have researched on ways to get rid of the smell, I've used an entire large bottle of febreze, I've sprinkled it with baking soda and then used a vacuum, I've tried vinegar, candles, open windows, ceiling fan... nothing. 3.5 weeks later it still smells. I will have to get a new mattress. Thankfully, Amazon did provide a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged. The pillow is hard. My teen was not liking how it sunk, but has gotten used to it. I was going to return it, but the repackaging was too much and my child decided to try it longer to see if they adjusted. Seems to be fine now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! I Sleep All Night!!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed! I suffer from major back pain due to scoliosis/arthritis/stenosis, etc! Going to bed was painful...I was constantly woken from pain at night... and got up with pain. Because of cost and not knowing what mattress to buy, we just didn't buy one. I bought the Resort Sleep bed and could not be happier! Actually I am amazed! After just 5 nights, I am sleeping all night and waking refreshed for the first time in at least 10-15 years! I can not recommend it enough 😃 And the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: V. Tofflemire

customer_reviews.title: Extremely firm not good for side or stomach sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I brought this matress on November 2018 this is like sleeping on a soft marble floor... this was beyond firm!! Recently I moved and was looking for a foam mattress, since I've been looking to buy one for years.. it's been about two weeks and I still wake up battered!!! I wouldn't recommend this mattress.. it's extremely firm,!!! And incredibly uncomfortable.. I don't have the time nor the energy.. im sleep deprived!!! I have read some of the customer service complaints..so I'll just suffer till spring and get a different mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ledia

customer_reviews.title: Very, very, firm
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived on time and well packaged. I am very sensitive to strong odors and was concerned about possible fumes from the materials. I was pleasantly surprised that there was little to no smell from this mattress. The mattress unpacked and expanded to its final shape quickly. That's the good, now the bad. This mattress is FIRM. Very FIRM. There is little to no give in this mattress. It somewhat conforms to your body, but not much. I tend to like a mattress that's on the firm side, but this one is too much for me. I'm going to try a adding a topper to see if this helps. If not, I'll be looking for a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: lovetheladies

customer_reviews.title: The worst sleep I've ever had and now my back hurts
customer_reviews.text: The worst sleep I've ever had and now my back hurts. Would not recommend. I then bought a mattress topper which helped a bit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Forseth

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of rigpped package
customer_reviews.text: Received the product with a rip on the package before I pulled it out of the box which inflated the bed. I did not use any sharp tools to rip the tape off the box. Had to return it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Very hard mattress wouldn't have bought it if I knew ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard mattress wouldn't have bought it if I knew now I can't return it because I'm past the return date really sucks
customer_reviews.author: Candace Hynes

customer_reviews.title: We have had this for over 2 years, so ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for over 2 years, so if you're wondering how it holds up over time, this review is for you. It doesn't. We are currently shopping for a new one. The memory foam has stopped popping back up on my husband's side, so he's just in a constant dip, unless we turn it so I can sleep in the dip for a while lol. He's not a heavy person either, weighs about 160. This mattress isn't one you can really flip either because of the way it's made. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wacker

customer_reviews.title: great product; great service
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this and received it about a week ago...never having order this type of product before as to packaging, i was leery...but it was great....and expanded quickly into the right dimensions....also the pillow (bonus) is wonderful !!!....i didn't notice very much smell and have enjoyed it every night since i installed it !!!...i would recommend this product with more than FIVE stars !!! and the service was great for this wonderful product...**i now have had this mattress for over six months....i am so very happy with it...it has changed my life with it's wonderful qualities....no more backaches and it hasn't worn down at all....this product is a great buy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later, mattress shopping again.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for 1 year. We're ready to replace it. The bed gets easily worn in where you lay. So the support we loved for the first few months is gone. We've turned our bed all four directions trying to make it last and get a good night's sleep. I wish I had bought a different mattress. And now we will need to look into a new one since our backs are always soar and we toss and turn to get comfortable. This is not durable for regular sleep. Maybe a guest bed that's rarely used.
customer_reviews.author: J. Highton

customer_reviews.title: As Comfortable As Our Bed At Home!
customer_reviews.text: After a ten day road trip with our little travel trailer last year we had to make a change. The original mattress almost killed our backs. So, before thanking our first trip this year we ordered the Resort Sleep RV Short queen. It is as comfortable as our memory foam mattress we have at home. When we do our next ten day road trip we will sleep as good as we do at home! Oh, and when you do get yours, be sure and buy a waterproof cover to go under your regular mattress pad. That's insurance for your investment should your RV spring a leak.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mattress when I first got it. So much so we have two in the house. However now approached 18 moi the since purchase it has developed what we call the spoon. It forces whoever is laying on it to roll right in the center and cuddle whether you want to or not. Very disappointed in the longevity of the product. Might be best served in a guest room where not used daily or by one person.
customer_reviews.author: jamandy

customer_reviews.title: This mattress surpases the $1000 matress we purchased locally!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this mattress. My husband and I have been sleeping on it for the last 1 yr and 7 months. Prior to this mattress, we had purchased a pillow top mattress at our local mattress store. That mattress only lasted about 3 months at which time we noticed sagging and it got so bad we ended up tossing it at a year old. We then decided to try this one, for the price it was worth it. We have never slept better. A year and a half later and still no sagging/ruts. Our only regret is that we wasted $1000 on that other mattress. Go for it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: MeMyself AndI

customer_reviews.title: sleep in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I always read several reviews before I purchase an item. The Live and Sleep - Resort Sleep Classic, Queen Size 10 Inch Cooling Medium Firm Memory Foam Mattress with Premium Form Pillow, Certipur Certified had a 90% approval rating. So I purchased mine and it was the best decision I've made all year. The comfort of this mattress is outstanding. I suffer from lower back pain and couldn't seem to sleep comfortably, and now I sleep like a baby. There's this plush feel, yet just the right amount of firmness. It's not that it's "great for the price". It's a quality mattress that easily rivals the more expensive ones. I love my mattress and pillow, too!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of site direct! Great bed
customer_reviews.text: It is truly medium firm. Holds together and pillow is awesome, bed molds to you - though I know NOW that I love firm bedding. Totally value priced and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: "Measurements may vary"
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because the mattress measures 39"x 73" and 9"tall. this is two inches shorter in length and 1" shorter than the 10 " height that was ordered. There is a disclaimer tag sewn on the mattress that says due to machining the measurements may vary. Even though the measurements are not what were advertised I am very happy with my purchase. It is a very comfortable mattress and was quite pleased with the price. The difference in measurements are forgotten when I am getting a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: DK in MI

customer_reviews.title: A good choice
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for 2 years and we love it. It moved with us and held up well! Compressing the foam with ratchet straps made moving with stairs a simple task! We use with a slat style platform and prior to weight loss over the last year for my spouse and I the bed was supporting a bit over 500 pounds. The king sleeps us and our large dog as well as cats and any children in our home who need a cuddle for the night.
customer_reviews.author: Appymomma

customer_reviews.title: Chiropractor recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for about 6 months now and I have 0 complaints. I can not believe the quality for the price. Me and my boyfriend are 6’ and 6’+ and regularly go to the chiropractor for back pain and he recommends this mattress to all of his patience. The bed is firm and supportive but still soft in all of the right ways. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress I’ve ever slept on!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mattress! I first experienced this mattress when I spend the night at my son’s house. He had bought one for his guest room. It was so comfortable and I slept better than I did in my own bed at home. When it came time to replace our own mattress recently, I ordered one of these. It is wonderful. I am now waking up pain feee again! This mattress is incredible for the price! So comfortable. Firm yet it gives just enough to mould to your body and support you. Love it! 4/9/2020 Update: Just purchased a second one for our guest room. Still love our mattress and now our houseguests do too!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Anderegg -Author of the Julu Series

customer_reviews.title: Good Mattress for Chronic Pain Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for me and my husband back in August. I've been sleeping on it for two months now and I honestly love it. I have severe joint and muscle problems (Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome, Fibromyalgia, Osteoarthritis of the hips) and laying on this bed relieves so much pressure from my body. I can sleep through the night without waking up from pain. I'm always burning up, but this mattress remains cool very well. It also doesn't transfer motion--if my husband moves or gets out of bed, I don't even notice. I seriously love this mattress, and for the price, you really can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Sabriyah S.

customer_reviews.title: Slump on the middle fold
customer_reviews.text: Haven't slept on it yet. So more to come. But I've let it expand for 36 hours now and there is a visible sag. This is not acceptable. I had the matress on a frame and noticed something odd in a sag visually. But I didn't have a reference point to judge. So I out the bed on the floor and put a level to my baseboard heating. The base boards are level (I checked with a carpenters level. It's sagged in the middle a good 3/4 of an inch. Oh and how convenient, right where your hips will be!!! Just look at the photo. I demand satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our original review after 3 nights was a 5 star ...
customer_reviews.text: Our original review after 3 nights was a 5 star, its now down to a 1 star as it grooves into a hole we rotated it regularly, other than both of us sleeping in the middle no other relief, we both wake up with a miserable backache and hip pain..... then when we click on the warranty information we have to sign in again and again and again and again.... no way to retrieve warranty you get sent to the circle of hell trying to get to the company site to claim warranty, buy it at your own peril
customer_reviews.author: MANONTHECROSS

customer_reviews.title: This Mattress is FIRM
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for my daughter in a Full XL. The description shows the firmness level as about a 2.5 out of 4, in the middle between Balanced and Firm. This bed is HARD. She and I have both tried sleeping in it, and it is just not comfortable at all. I purchased a thick mattress pad hoping that might help, but it did not. I wish I could return it, but it looks like I am past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Laura I

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased a mattress, or had a new one. But my hand-me-down one was hurting my back beyond belief! This mattress came in a box rolled up, but was easy to take out and place. I ordered a full, and while I'm used to Queen sized this is pretty much the same thing if you're debating between the two. It is firm and sturdy, but foam, so its very comfortable. Also, the pillow that comes with it has erased my neck pain from the pillow I was using. This is affordable, but a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised & Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My son had a growth spurt and his feet were hanging out of the bed! So we had to get a bed quick. I read a hundred reviews & researched many brands & decided on this one. My son was pleasantly surprised and in love. He’s a very active teenager who loves his bed. It is really comfortable and he falls asleep quickly every time. I have fibromyalgia and have enjoyed a couple of comfy naps in it too. Which is really hard for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Good Whyfe

customer_reviews.title: You will need to replace this mattress within a year!
customer_reviews.text: These mattresses last 3 to 4 months before the sag and leave you with back pain each morning. We bought 2 xl twin mattresses for our “split king” sized bed. I am 140 lbs and my husband is 220. The weight difference didn’t seem to matter both mattresses sag in the middle. There is no firmness left and we need to replace the mattresses. Don’t buy unless you plan to buy another one 6 to 9 months from now.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Really love the mattress so far.  Can't wait till I use it for 2 month straight.  I highly recommend this mattress to RVers.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. So far I really like the mattress. I put I in my RV. I was going to buy an RV mattress till I seen their prices which are more expensive than a high quality mattress you would buy at a mattress company. I am very satisfied with the resort Sleep Queen 10" cooling memory foam mattress. I am going RVing for a couple of months soon. If I am thinking correctly how it feels now, I will probably purchase one for my home when I return. Only problem I had is that they only give you one pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing mattress!!! Super comfortable can't feel other person move it forms to your body.its even larger than I expected width wise.i couldn't believe how well packaged it was. And it rose right away. I would give this mattress 100 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Best bed I’ve personally slept on.
customer_reviews.text: Had this since September of last year and I’m loving it. Haven’t had an uncomfortable night other than a few anomalies but they may be due to me having already been sore prior to lying down. It’s a bit on the firm side but that actually isn’t a bad thing. I’ve learned to appreciate former beds thanks to this one. My only issue is that it didn’t quite fully inflate on the top and bottom edges but it’s not a huge deal because you never see those anyway. Love this bed. For anyone looking for a super comfortable bed that isn’t expensive, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ha McM

customer_reviews.title: 1st Night
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came in flat as a pancake, as I expected it to. The instructions said allow 24-72 hours to fully inflate. I bought this mattress for my 16 year old daughter whom has severe scoliosis. She allowed the mattress about 1.5 hours to inflate, then she laid on it and fell asleep and slept through the night. This morning on the way to school she said Mom, I love my new mattress. Her only complaint was she was hot. I plan to get a mattress cover/protector maybe that will help. I will post all updates in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: r. miller

customer_reviews.title: Just "Yes". It's That Good.
customer_reviews.text: It's so comfy! It might be a little firm, but that's how I like it. And for the price? Tough to beat. A friend of mine has the king size (mine is the queen) and we both love ours. I don't know anything about taking the cover off, though I read on these reviews that it's a bad idea, so I went ahead and ordered a mattress protector. Seems to work great. Delivery was a snap, setup was easy (yeah, it was chemical-y for a bit but that faded after a day or so), and it has definitely held its own after a year. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty neat to order a bed online and have it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty neat to order a bed online and have it shipped directly to your front door. It's crazy how they can compress such a large bed to such a small size. It rolled out fine and popped up to size. When I first laid on it I was worried because it was as hard as a rock. You do sink in and I don't have any complaints. I have been sleeping on the bed fora couple of weeks now. I'm a side sleeper and have sciatica pain so I'm really sensitive to pressure zones. I haven't had any issues with pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Casorio

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: I slept on a queen size of this at a friend's house and knew I needed a king size. King size is just as wonderful. I received what I expected so I'm not sure about everyone else here but I love this bed. I had to sleep on the floor before because I HATE soft beds but this very firm and doesn't hurt my back. We'll see how it ages but I have memory foam pillows that have lasted a long while so maybe there's hope? It always bounces back too. No indent after you get up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeci

customer_reviews.title: Firm but cushy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress because I was trying to avoid a memory foam mattress with a fiberglass layer and I didn’t read anything in the product information or reviews about it having one. I was disappointed to find that it does indeed have a fiberglass layer, but overall, I’m very pleased with the mattress anyway. It’s firm, but cushy and it’s very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: No problems great price.
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews on this mattress so I expected it be on the firm side.product was delivered within the Prime 2 day policy with no damage to the package. Followed the directions put in place. Within 24 hours it had expanded to its 10 inch height and I did not experience any odor from the mattress or the pillow. I got it while Amazon had it on sale which made my decision to purchase this one a no brainner. I have yet to sleep on it but did lay down on it . It felt firm but not hard. Think I made a good purchase and hope to go camping soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this mattress! The packaging was perfect and manageable, even for someone with a smaller frame and some neck problems. I'm a stomach and side sleeper, and for the first time in my life, I do not find myself tossing and turning to relieve pressure on the usual areas, such as ankles, hips, and shoulders. My neck feels better than it has in years. I tend to sleep very warm, and this mattress seems to alleviate that. It inflated beautifully within the first 24 hours, and there was no disagreeable smell. I love this mattress so much, that I have recommended it to quite a few people that I know are shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Actually fairly soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad who has multiple old-guy aches and pains. He loves it because it is not the hard/firm mattress he had for years and is soft enough for him. I loved that it arrived in a manageable size package and poofed up as advertised without me having to wrangle a traditional mattress. My only gripe is that "medium-firm" really is pretty soft. My spring mattress is "medium-firm" and this is nowhere near that. If I had bought it for me, it would have been returned. I'm hesitant to buy one for that reason. However, the guy who is sleeping on it likes it, and that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: S. SloanTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bed - comes with crazy back pain though.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed. Crazy back pain throughout the day though. I’ve been sleeping on this bed for 4 months now. Been getting really bad back pain. Didn’t know where or what caused the back pain. I tried massages and even chiropractic. Pain was temporary relieved. Then I went to Columbia for 2 weeks pain disappeared. Came back and a week or two weeks, the back pain started coming again. The only conclusion is the bed. Wanted to return it but it’s too late now.
customer_reviews.author: James D Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is happy with her new mattress
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress for our daughter. The previous mattress was causing her nose to be stuffy every single night and keeping her awake. We realized she had had her old mattress too long and dust mites had probably built up in it. So we purchased this mattress along with a dust mite protective cover and she has had absolutely no problems ever since. The mattress feels great and she sleeps well. She's happy and we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult to move on, pushes me out side of bed, not cool at all.
customer_reviews.text: while pretty, too soft for me. makes is too difficult to get to center, pushes me off side of bed. cant hold a fitted sheet on. nothing to grab to help pull towards center. feel warm underneath body . while much is due to me and my weight etc, too difficult to find any comfort, having to buy a different new mattress. also, came with blemish on top from the factory.I don't think I can be any more unhappy with this purchase regardless of its "elegant feel" .......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bed in the house!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put in my 12-year old son's room we were updating. Wow, am I impressed with the comfort and quality for the cost. It arrived tightly packed in a box which they recommend opening within 72 hours of arrival so the mattress will fully fill out. We followed the instructions and couldn't be happier with the results. The mattress is very comfortable and my son loves sleeping on his new bed. Added plus is the pillow that comes with the mattress! Will definitely purchase another when we're ready to replace other mattresses in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: They are not all the same...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a queen the first time for my mom and I loved it. I got to sleep on it for a couple of weeks and this mattress was amazing, I slept really good and woke up feeling good. I bought a king size for me and was very disappointed. How can they be so different? The king isn't as full as the queen, and it seems like the thickness is uneven, I feel like I'm sleeping on a slope.
customer_reviews.author: H. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Did not take too long to get to full size after opening the box...maybe about an hour. Took me two days to get use to the matress and really enjoy it. It has that firmness yet plush at the same time. Now I get a good nights sleep and can rest properly. For the price...I really do recommend this purchase. Comes with a pillow too.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: A really poor representation of Amazon's products
customer_reviews.text: The issue here is that the seller never returned any comments after writing them. The mattress came in a compressed state, which one needs to allow time for it to fully inflate. The large issue to me was the (4) corners turn in, and one has the feeling of falling off the mattress because the middle is higher than any other part. Secondly, I would have returned it, however, its impossible to get the "genie back in the bottle" once one opens the compressed plastic its in. A really poor representation of Amazon's products, which I never had any issue with.
customer_reviews.author: pauline freberg

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mattress a lot! Only problem I had was when my boyfriend stayed over we kind of ended up sinking into the same spot. He’s heavier than me so I’d wake up stuck in his mattress taco. I’d consider a mattress topper if you don’t sleep alone!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a firm mattress?  This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad experience with a foam mattress years ago and hated to buy another. However, I had to because my wife needed an adjustable bed so I took the leap and luckily landed on this mattress from Resort Sleep. My most pleasant surprise was the minimal odor. When I first removed the packaging I could put my nose an inch or two away from the mattress and detect a very faint odor, but two days later -- NOTHING! If you are looking for a firm mattress, look no further, this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: bgude

customer_reviews.title: Very firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as medium firm, but as many of the reviews said, it's very firm. I like a firm mattress but it was even too firm for me. I ordered a 2 inch foam mattress topper that hopefully will make it more comfortable. The mattress was well packaged and easy to set up and had no odor which was a relief. I let it fully inflate to the 10 inches before sleeping on it which may or may not be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: venuspaint

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping for a mattress for my guest room when I found this product on Amazon. It was much less expensive than buying a regular mattress and had great reviews. I had never had a memory foam mattress before, so once I set it up, I had to try it out for myself. I ended up sleeping in my guest room for over a week, just because this mattress is so much more comfortable than my over-priced, conventional king mattress. I actually thought it might be too soft, but its actually quite firm and very comfortable. I don't wake up with a sore back, like I sometimes do on the conventional mattress.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect For ME...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be made extremely well even considering the price. My wife and i are both over weight by quite a bit and i have a bit of arthritis in my back. we ordered the medium firm and it is perfect for me. the first night or two took a bit of getting accustomed to but now hand down the best bed i have slept in.
customer_reviews.author: William Clune

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived ahead of schedule!! We purchased this to go on top of an adjustable frame bed and works wonderfully in that capacity. The bed offers firm support yet gives some softness. The mattress fluffed up quickly and the pillow was a bonus. THANKS!! No odor to complain of. My only complaint is the sides are soft. If you get too close to the edge, you feel like you might roll out of the bed. It slopes easily. I wish there was more resistance, especially since that's where you sit, thus breaking in or down those sides, as the mattress ages.
customer_reviews.author: Sherree Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since we purchased this bed*, but I absolutely hated it. A year after we bought the bed, I'm still recovering from my sciatic nerve becoming completely jacked up (I'm still numb on one side from hip to heel). This bed is only good for those who have zero spinal/hip issues, so I'm guessing only young people. There is absolutely no support. It is my own fault, but it really is awful. *Obviously we had to buy a new bed so it was a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: AlohaLivin

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my motor home and it is very comfortable. It has a cushy top layer about 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my motor home and it is very comfortable. It has a cushy top layer about 1 1/2 " inches thick and then it is firm, firm but not hard,, enough to support my fused lower back. It expanded to the full 10 inches overnight and is very comfortable. For the price it can't be beat,, for any price its a great deal as anytime i buy a mattress its a roll of the dice it seems. I rolled this time and the dice came up lucky sevens ! I highly recommend this mattress for anyone with a bad back and i have owned very expensive mattresses that were not as comfortable as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cousin Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy at first, but after only 4 years, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After only 4 years, the mattress started to sage in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Best Goldilocks mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our guest room ahead of 5 different visits from various family members over the holidays. EVERY ONE OF THEM said, they loved the mattress. The kicker for me was that each of them had vastly different preferences on the firmness or softness of their mattresses, but each of them loved this magic little gem. The off gassing was almost nonexistent, no chemical smells, no issues with fit or the cover. Overall, thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mama donuts

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 10 inch but got a bearly 9 inch...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 inch mattress and received barely 9 inch. I do like that it came with a memory foam pillow which is nice and comfy....I like the mattress overall, but i really wanted the 10 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mattress
customer_reviews.text: A++++++ Fantastic mattress. Very comfortable. Needed a new mattress in motorhome so decided to try this one out. It is exactly what we need. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David Brassette

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Y'all. Buy this. It's true to the firmer side. But oh so comfy. Replaced our original camper mattress after 3 years. Can't believe it took us that long. On the third night husband slept for 12 hrs straight! I was worried about it being only foam and too soft, but it's very supportive. The pillow that comes with it is an awesome bonus. The only con is I need new sheets since this one is so nice and plush.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: Good sleep
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to our daughter and her husband. Did lot's of research, this one seemed best for mixed sleeper types on same king mattress. They absolutely love it - slept an extra 3 hours on the first night. Seems to have helped with shoulder and back issues for both. Too soon to tell how it will hold up, but it seems very well made, was well packaged (UPS loves those 90 pound boxes, so they had ripped it in one spot but the internal bag was undamaged). Seems like an excellent company and a step up from the ones that cost $100 less.
customer_reviews.author: good or not

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and sound sleep
customer_reviews.text: It was incredibly comfortable. I have arthritis and on my old mattress it was not uncommon to be awoken several times during the night due to pain. I would toss and turn most of the night trying to get comfortable. The Live and Sleep mattress has given me both comfort and pain relief. I couldn't believe how it hardly tossed the first night as well as woke up feeling refreshed and as though I had a good nights sleep!! I also really appreciated the coolness as it get pretty warm at night. Thank you Live and Sleep, I will definitely recommend you to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: FramaA

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhhhsome!
customer_reviews.text: Well, This is a fine thing! You know how, when it's dreary and damp or raining and cold out, you just want to stay in bed? Well, the sun is shining, the birds are singing, and I STILL just want to stay in bed. I was concerned the mattress might not be firm enough (I do not like squishy mattresses) but it is great. And as advertised, it is not hot. I like everything about this mattress but having to get up!
customer_reviews.author: SC in SC

customer_reviews.title: I now wake up one or two times a night and that is a great improvement in my quality of life
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is absolute magic for my back. I am someone with five herniated discs and a enlarged prostate. Between the pain and having to go to the bathroom, I rarely slept more than one hour at a time. I now wake up one or two times a night and that is a great improvement in my quality of life. My wife is very sensitive with chemical odors and she commented that this mattress had almost no odor right out of the box. The selling price makes it a great value too.
customer_reviews.author: LIBERTY

customer_reviews.title: Great, firm mattress...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I've had no issues. It is the most firm bed I've had, but I wanted firm, and they do note that in the description. Not a fan of the pillow, didn't seem to have enough cushion to it. Would have liked to have paid less and not had the pillow. And for some reason the full size was more expensive than the queen size...weird economics. All that being said though, I certainly recommend this if you like sleeping firm.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Walker

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Firm and slightly conforms to your body. The paper that came with the mattress said to give it 24 hours to puff up and take shape. I let it sit on the floor for two days as it didnt look like it was fully formed in the 24 hours. There is a slight odor that has gone away after a few days. Im told this is typical of these types of mattresses. . Wasnt expecting this kind of quality for the price. Pleasant surprise. It came with a free pillow which my cat took over while it was puffing up. Since I didnt plan on using it anyway, he now has a comfy place to sleep too.
customer_reviews.author: Forlornmyth

customer_reviews.title: Its softer than I would like, but perfect for my fiance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because its rated a middle of the road firmness. Its softer than I would like, but perfect for my fiance, who was the main subject when deciding which firmness to get. it rose to the correct dimensions in less than the time stated. Someone reviewed and said they didn't have the sinking/falling sensation when getting too close to the edge of the bed, I disagree. My fiance and I both feel the bed has little to no support at the edges that you would find in a normal spring mattress. Overall, the comfort and satisfaction with this product is meeting expectations, we have had this item approximately a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Lony

customer_reviews.title: Hard... Way too hard.
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the hardest mattress I've ever slept on. It's was a total waste of money for me and too much trouble to return so I'm out a big chunk of change. I sleep terribly on this. Tossing and turning all night and my back is killing me in the morning. I am sorely disappointed.... And just SORE. Can't get a good night sleep camping in my trailer on this and can't afford anything different. Miserable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ehlert

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh!
customer_reviews.text: We have slept so good on this bed. We've had it for about a month now. I have been a very light/restless sleeper for years. Have even tried different mattresses. Finally we both get a full nights sleep. IT does sleep a little warmer than our old sleep number mattress, but lighter bedding has solved that issue. The enclosed pillow is great for me, but I am puzzled as to why they would only send one pillow with a king size mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: When I first laid down on this mattress I thought it was a little too firm. But I ended up having the best night sleep I've ever had. I've had the mattress about a week now and love it more everyday. The quality and craftsmanship is impeccable. There was no smell. Basically, I just really love this mattress. I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far and loving it
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we open the box to start setting up we put aside as we set our frame together the mattress was already expanded though we did wait the recommended 24-48hrs around 36 to actually lay on it and it feels great no squeaking noises was able to escape the bed without waking the baby had a great night sleep so far it's been 2 nights sleeping on it and I love it. The real question is just waiting to see how long the mattress last and that review will be answered at least couple months to a year.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: 3 of them were delivered with no trouble and 1 had a hard time getting here but Amazon customer service was amazing and helped u
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these in twin size for bunk beds. 3 of them were delivered with no trouble and 1 had a hard time getting here but Amazon customer service was amazing and helped us get it here so no complaints. So far, we love these mattresses! They plump right up and seem like they will be comfortable for kids and adults. I haven't slept on them overnight but just laying in them feels pretty heavenly. Previous reviews talked about an odor but we did not notice any and the free pillows are great and feel like an extra added bonus. Very happy so far with these!
customer_reviews.author: Momof7

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mattress. We have one in our camper, guest room and this one we bought for our room. The reason I am only giving 4 stars is because we ordered a 10 inch but it never expanded past 9 inches. That prompted me to go look at the one in our guest room and sure enough it was also less inches than ordered. The company did refund $75 but It’s still very disappointing. I would definitely recommend that you order a 12 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress less than 2 months later.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about buying this mattress. I read the review but even that can be it or miss. It is super heavy. Make sure you open it were you want to leave it. Once I opened..I saw the pillow and was surprised every just ballooned quickly. I let it set for 24 hours. I love it. I takes a little getting used to. It doesn't have the same support as a regular mattress. It does support your body when you sleep on it. It gives way when you are about to get up off the mattress. Other than that I slept like a baby. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Colon

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS
customer_reviews.text: I've always had Tempurpedics, with the accompanying astronomical price. I needed a bed ASAP for a rental, and held my breath at the price of this. IT IS WONDERFUL!!! As good as or better than my Temp at a fraction of the cost. Don't hesitate, this mattress is terrific. It actually seems more resilient than my Temp. The pillow was great; the packing and adjusting to full size was quick and easy, took a few hours at most. I'm truly amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Pellucid

customer_reviews.title: Ive had this mattress for less than a year, and have been having lower back pain return because it's become soft again.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and it just unfolded after cutting the plastic off. I bought a California king. It's comfortable, though not as firm as I expected from the reviews. I've had to buy this bed due to recent back pain. My only complaints are that it was shipped in ONLY plastic. No box. So it got a little dirty being on the ground, thankfully i could dust it off. Secondly, it fits awkwardly upon the boxsprings. I have even turned it to see if it would fit better the other way. Still fit akwardly. But for the price, and comfort, I'm happy. And my SO and 80lb pup fit nicely without feeling them move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for price!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a fancy temperpedic back home and purchased this one for the room we stay in at my parents out of state. Both my husband and I are VERY impressed! It's firm, but not too firm. When I first sat on it I was nervous it would be soft, but it's not. We both would absolutely recommend this bed, but would also recommend it for people looking for a foam bed without the bells and whistles of the big named brands. I'm not sure we've experienced the cooling or memory foam as of yet, but again this is our vacation bed. Great nights sleep!
customer_reviews.author: TK4LOVE

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with my new mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my new mattress! I was so nervous to try it as I have scoliosis and chronic back pain but I needed to try something new! The mattress came quickly, we let it set up for a day (there was no smell as some others have said) then we put it on the bed. It's only been a few days but I am sleeping great and hoping the morning back aches get better too. I heartily recommend this mattress, I'm hoping to have it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Son Who Now Says He Feels Spoiled. Very Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 20 year old son. He says it is a curse because he doesn't want to get out of bed to go to work. He works at the airport as ground crew handling baggage all day and he was having severe back pain. He states it is gone now. Also, no bad odor as previous reported with other faom mattresses. And I want to give a huge Thank You! It was supposed to arrive on Monday so I wasn't going to get to see him get it due to my own work...it came a day early and I got to see the joy on his face
customer_reviews.author: karebear77

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have only slept on it for 2 nights. It is comfortable so far, decent quality! This is the third mattress I have bought from this company. No complaints!! This new mattress I just bought is a little firm for me but still comfortable, thinking to get a cooling soft topper for this one. Love that you get a free memory foam pillow with your new mattress! I would buy from this company again, and again, and again. Thank You Live & Sleep!!
customer_reviews.author: Well Read Human

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Full XL for our son. First, Full XL is hard to find. He needed the extra length, but there is not enough space for a queen. I was a little skeptical about buying a mattress that we could not test out first. But so far, we are happy with our purchase. He's only slept on it one night, but he loves it. He now fits in his bed without his feet hanging over the end and it is very comfortable. For the price, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AZdaisy

customer_reviews.title: Squishy
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the mattress to our apartment yesterday eve, opened the bag and put together our bed frame while the mattress puffed up. We slept on it last night. As a side-sleeper, I think this is the first time in awhile I haven't woken up because of pressure points! But I'm also prone to migrating to the edge of the bed in my sleep and the mattress does such a good job of conforming that I squished right off the edge of the bed a couple times. haha It was comfortable enough that I'm considering getting another to replace the mattress in our guest room!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cearley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, comfortable mattress with just the right amount of softness and support
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful mattress, much better than I was expecting for the price. I was leery about buying a mattress online sight unseen, but I like it better than my previous one, which was a Tempurpedic. For me, the new mattress had just the right blend of softness and support. I tend to prefer softer mattresses, and I was a little leery that this one might be too firm, but I love it. More importantly, so does my dog. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny2o0o

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress but smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is great! Very firm. Can be hard to get up due to the firmness. The mattress also has some kind of chemical smell. It’s hard to describe. Almost like rat poison but almost like stout dog pee... if the smell was gone this would be a 5 star. We’ve had it for almost a month now and sadly the smell is still here.
customer_reviews.author: ashley farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a great value. I bought two similar mattresses at an actual mattress store a year ago and paid over $750. When it came time to get another one for our third child, I decided to look on Amazon. In looking through all the choices and reviews, this one seemed to have the best price/value relationship. My daughter is very pleased with the mattress. It is very comfortable and shipped quickly and was effortless to setup. As a bonus, it came with a memory foam pillow.
customer_reviews.author: mmrbarto

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my pain
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain from Lyme. Sleeping on this mattress has helped a lot. I also really like the pillow that came with it. Both took getting used to. They're different from your normal mattress and pillow, but it only takes a couple days to adjust. I sleep alone, but I'm pretty sure that my constant movements (which have actually decreased with this bed) would not be noticed by a partner.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce-Kay Ruckelshaus

customer_reviews.title: Meh, its ok
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2015. I am a single woman 150#. I have rotated this mattress monthly and yet there is a depression on each side of the bed from me lying on it. It makes me super sweaty and the mattress has a funky smell the next day. Sorry to be graphic. Long and short is it was ready to be replaced after 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: hekelamac

customer_reviews.title: Best RV Mattress Ever
customer_reviews.text: This. mattress is outstanding!!!! We out it in our RV and it is even more comfortable than the $6,000 big name memory foam mattress we have at home. One night on this mattress and my back feels like new again. Contrary to other reviews I read, I don't think it sleeps hot at all, Very comfortable and absolutely no smell. I highly recommend this for back, side, or stomach sleepers. Can't say enough about how amazing this mattress is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! We purchased it for our RV to replace the factory mattress and have slept on it for the past 7 nights with no complaints. We both agree that it sleeps as well as our I-comfort hybrid mattress that we have at home. The description says that it is medium/firm, we agree. While it has excellent support, it doesn't "feel" hard due to the memory foam. We also noticed that it doesn't feel hot like other memory foam mattresses that we have tried. So far, very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MAGEN MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the bed also has a lot of support.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed. It's worth a lot more than what it sells for. I bought two beds in the past two years. Both were supposedly high quality; Posturpedic and Beauty Rest. Both beds wore out in about 30 days ! This bed is obviously made with high quality memory foam. I thought I would have to see a back doctor before I bought this bed. Now after sleeping on it for around a month, I can say that my back feels a lot better, I'm sleeping better and the bed is so comfortable I've been sleeping more :). I am really satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Inspectruss

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: Or old spring mattress was old and uncomfortable so it was time to replace it. We thought we would try this. I was so surprised how well this worked out. My wife sleeps better, no pain when she wakes, even with her arthritis. The lack of bounce takes some getting used to but that’s just habit. There is a very slight chemical smell but it’s not so strong that it’s unpleasent. When I wake I can get up without waking her. The cat even gives it her approval.
customer_reviews.author: Badgerr inc

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep, but maybe a tad soft
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping for a nice firm mattress but it's really not that firm. I'm only 110 pounds and I sink in a couple inches, however it does support me and I think it's great. My husband thinks it's too soft but does enjoy the support it gives anyway (he has back issues and prefers extra firm). We chose this mattress over another one we'd slept on because they claim they do free returns, which was a huge selling point for me. I didn't try to return it, but if you're deciding between another one make sure you check their return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: *12 Star's ************
customer_reviews.text: *Omg! I absolutely love, love, love my new "Resort Sleep" / California king Matress. It is amazing! I had never, ever been on one before and I was totally amazed at this brand & type of matress. I don't know if I would ever buy a regular type of matress again, because I find this one soooo very comfortable. I wish I had known about this year's ago.... And the "10" sizing & with rising of it, was absolutely perfect. And I absolutely love the free memory foam pillow that came with the matress. I love it!!! *I would definitely buy this matress again in the future...
customer_reviews.author: SONJA

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a dud or what. There are so many great reviews, but sometimes I wonder if these reviews were paid for? My mattress did not inflate correctly. One side was way taller and it was so uncomfortable. My son wakes up crying that his hips hurt. Again Im not sure if I just got a dud or what. I am supposed to send it back for my refund. I have no idea how the heck Im supposed to do that. This whole experience has been the biggest hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal N Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great bed but needs airing out first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my mom who was constantly complaining about her back. I have a memory foam mattress and love it! So far my mom hasn’t complained about her back since she got the mattress and loves the pillow that came with it. Her only complaint was the smell. It had a very strong stink to it so she put a fan in her room for almost a week to get rid of the smell, most likely from the plastic it was wrapped in?
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: No chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: NO SMELL! One of my major concerns with ordering a foam mattress off Amazon was I wasn’t sure about the reviews on all the different mattresses that talked about a chemical smell. I went through tons of mattresses to find one that doesn’t smell for our toddler and decided to take the chance with this one. With this mattress there is literally no smell just a new smell when you press your nose up against it but nothing bad at all! The mattress and pillow inflated in less than 10 minutes and is a perfect fit on our sons twin bed. Very satisfied and our son, 3, loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping on this mattress for a week and I have to say it is one of the most comfortable mattresses I’ve ever had. It fully expanded within minutes and was delivered in a timely manner. You do have that sinking feeling when you sit on the edge but if you move a bit further off the edge you don’t get the sinking as much. I have such deep comfortable sleep with this mattress I will definitely recommend it. Absolutely fabulous for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Juana

product_meta.title: Live & Sleep Classic Twin Mattress in a Box, Memory Foam Mattress - 10 Inch - Cool Bed in a Box - Medium-Firm - Bonus Premium Form Pillow - Certi-PUR Certified - Twin Size
feature_bullets: PERFECT CONTOUR. Our twin / single size mattress cradles you in a deluxe cushion of 2.5” Premium Air-Flow Infused visco over a layer of High Density Support Base. Extra-thick profile brings luxury hotel touch
COOLER INNOVATION. Breathable, plush & better quality materials, not cheap inexpensive foam. Optimum comfort that relaxes & cools your body. Deep rest for a long day ahead. No coils or latex used

BEST SOLUTION. Top Rated Mattress with over 90% 5-star reviews on Amazon. Classic medium-firm HD core relieves pressure points + less tossing & turning. Targets sore shoulders & hips + aids in back pain relief. Signature feel recharges you from a dream night of ultimate slumber

SOFT FABRIC COVER. Flex linen works on any home bedroom furniture bedframe, box-spring or futon. Stays comfortable and has a cloud like sensation. Use a bedding pad or protector on any mattress, cot, tri-fold or guest room bed

CERTIPUR-US CERTIFIED & BONUS free memory-foam pillow. Non toxic, Eco-Friendly & Hypoallergenic + Great on a boxspring, metal platform, adjustable bed or hard floor only. New purchase includes full refund guarantee from 30 day trial + 20-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,319 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
